vsParam: Gee. This paper is so good...!

Ha-ha-ha. Yes, it is.
So... you wanna do it again? Rock-paper-scissors...

No. I'll pay you.
Please accept it.

Ahhhhhh!?
What's going on with you, Verbena!? You're not acting like yourself!?
Gee! It's so rude to say that.

This paper... is not a request from the "Female Pirate
Verbena"; it's a request from the ordinary "Verbena".

That's right. Although I won't use the paper right now...
I do plan to write a book.

Luckily, I exist in this world as a ghost.
And I can go for adventures and treasure hunts.

All my adventures after today...
will be written down with my own hand.

Hmm. I think this is a good idea!
[px], Eros would be so happy, right?

I will. And I'll write that Verbena is very good at
rock-paper-scissors... Yeah, I must write like that ♪

No matter what...
I'll record everything about Eros in detail.

He was the one who led me to the sea.
And hence, he is essential in my legend.

Ha-ha-ha. You're right!
We really look forward to reading your book, Verbena...!

I look forward to it too.
How will I record those adventures, and...

Hehe. How many copies will I sell? The autobiography
written by the dead Verbena... Will it be a best-seller?

Ha-ha-ha...
Does Rod rub off on you, Verbena?

Maybe ♪... So, I can't stay here and do nothing.
I must decide where to go for my next adventure.

I'm Verbena, Captain of Voltex.
My new legend shall begin now...
